summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Lakeside Avenue South, from a point 40 feet south of Holgate Street to Irving Street, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7740 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
